component.name: RNASeqReadStatsBarChart
component.doc: Bar chart of read count statistics determined with RNASeqReadStats
component.author: Christian Frech

input.name: stats
input.doc: Read count statistics returned by RNASeqReadStats

parameter.name: caption
parameter.default: RNA-seq read counts per sample and category. Samples sorted by number of uniquely mapping protein-coding reads in descending order.

parameter.name: samplesPerRow
parameter.doc: Number of samples per row. The number of rows in the figure is then calculated by dividing the total number of samples by the number specified here, such that all samples are plotted on one page.

parameter.name: yMax
parameter.doc: Maximum value on y-axis in million reads.
